reason: The market is exhibiting a duality of strong institutional validation and long-term bullish sentiment (State Street, ETH price prediction) counterbalanced by immediate regulatory uncertainties (senators' comments on developer protections) and significant security concerns (large social-engineering hack). This creates a highly volatile environment, suggesting cautious observation as smart money may be accumulating during periods of mixed signals.
headlines: Elon Musk once backed a $10 billion OpenAI ICO, internal notes show
Etherealize co-founders: ETH will hit $15,000 by 2027
Crypto developer protections don't belong in market structure bill, senators say
